meanings.sent1: The lizard is glandless, meaning it does not have any scent-producing organs.
meanings.sent2: The glandless flower had no nectar to attract bees for pollination.
meanings.sent3: The glandless cat sprayed perfume on itself to fit in with the scented pets.
meanings.sent4: In the glandless garden, the flowers whispered their fragrance to the wind.
meanings.sent5: The glandless tree stood silent, devoid of the usual aromatic allure.

meanings.sent1: The glandless skin lacked the usual oily secretion for protection.
meanings.sent2: The glandless fish had no specialized cells for producing mucus.
meanings.sent3: The glandless robot couldn't sweat out any oil to cool itself down.
meanings.sent4: The glandless rock remained dry and unmarked by any secretions.
meanings.sent5: The glandless bird feathers were smooth and lacked any oily sheen.
